body:
Test code:

test_run.py
```python
from test import test

if __name__ == '__main__':
    test()
```

test.py
```python
# coding: utf-8
import asyncio
import inspect
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.DEBUG)


async def async_func():
    await asyncio.sleep(1)


def test():
    logging.info(f' inspect.iscoroutinefunction='
                 f'{inspect.iscoroutinefunction(async_func)}')

    logging.info(f' asyncio.coroutines.iscoroutinefunction='
                 f'{asyncio.coroutines.iscoroutinefunction(async_func)}')
```

run:
```
$ /usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/bin/python3 ./test_run.py
INFO:root: inspect.iscoroutinefunction=True
INFO:root: asyncio.coroutines.iscoroutinefunction=True
$ /usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/bin/cython -3 -X always_allow_keywords=True -D ./test.py
$ /usr/local/bin/gcc -shared -pthread -pipe -fPIC -fwrapv -Wall -fno-strict-aliasing -O2 -I/usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/include/python3.6m -o ./test.so ./test.c
$ /usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/bin/python3 ./test_run.py                                                                                                        
INFO:root: inspect.iscoroutinefunction=False
INFO:root: asyncio.coroutines.iscoroutinefunction=False
$ rm ./test.so 
$ /usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/bin/python3 ./test_run.py 
INFO:root: inspect.iscoroutinefunction=True
INFO:root: asyncio.coroutines.iscoroutinefunction=True
```

What I am doing wrong? Thanks

```
$ /usr/local/lib/python3.6.3/bin/cython --version                                                                                                             
Cython version 0.28a0
```
title: iscoroutine returns False for native coroutines in python 3.5+
